feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:26 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or drizzle ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle later this morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h late this morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Freezing rain with periods of rain early this evening and with ice pellets overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
